rules: Headings (h1-h3) MUST use tracking-tight and font-weight-800 to mimic the 'heavy' fintech aesthetic.
Numbers (prices, dates) MUST use tabular-nums for alignment.

usage_rules: NEVER use pure black (#000000). Use Obsidian (#0F1115).
Primary Orange (#FF6600) is for CTAs and Key Data points ONLY. Do not overuse.
Use the 'Teal' accent for 'Money Received' or 'Booking Confirmed' states (Monzo style).

customizations.Button: Must be pill-shaped (rounded-full). Primary buttons use the Orange gradient. Secondary buttons use 'bg-white/10 hover:bg-white/20'.
customizations.Card: Use 'bg-[#16191F]' with a 'border-white/5' border. Add a subtle hover lift (-translate-y-1).
customizations.Input: Deep background 'bg-[#0A0C10]' with 'border-white/10'. Focus ring must be Orange (#FF6600).
customizations.Badge: Use 'rounded-md' (not full pill) for status indicators to differentiate from buttons.

rules: Dashboard MUST use a Bento Grid layout (mix of 1x1, 2x1, 2x2 tiles).
Mobile view acts like a PWA: Bottom Navigation Bar (fixed), Top Header (sticky).
Containers with borders MUST have internal padding (p-6) to prevent text collision.

visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Use 'backdrop-blur-md bg-black/40' for sticky headers and bottom nav.
visual_enhancers.noise: Add a subtle noise texture overlay at 2% opacity to the main background to kill digital flatness.
micro_interactions: Cards: Lift (-4px) and glow on hover.
Inputs: Border color transition on focus.

shareable_assets.booking_ticket: The 'Share Link' card should look like a digital event ticket or boarding pass. High contrast, QR code prominent, 'Add to Wallet' vibe.

media.image_style: High contrast, moody lighting, authentic action shots (no staged stock smiles).

accessibility.contrast: Ensure text on Orange (#FF6600) is White or Black depending on size (APCA check).
accessibility.focus_states: Visible focus rings (2px solid Orange) on all interactive elements.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. SETUP: Configure Tailwind with the custom colors (Obsidian, Blaze Orange) immediately.
2. COMPONENTS: Customize Shadcn components in `src/components/ui` to match the 'rounded-full' button and 'rounded-xl' card style.
3. LAYOUT: Build the 'Dashboard' using a CSS Grid (Bento style). Do not use simple flex columns.
4. MOBILE: Ensure the 'Bottom Nav' is fixed at the bottom for mobile screens (z-50).
5. VIBE: Use the 'noise' texture on the body background.
6. TESTING: Add `data-testid` to all interactive elements.
universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI Slop': No generic centered layouts. Use asymmetry.
Dark Mode First: Design for dark mode primarily, light mode is secondary.
No Gradients on Text: Keep text solid white/grey for readability.
